medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient has a 3 day history of left lower quadrant pain after initially having left low back pain for 1 week, treated with pain medication. Developed nausea, vomiting, and low-grade fever. Reports no diarrhea, hematochezia, or melena.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertriglyceridemia; past surgical history includes EGD, colonoscopy, and C-section.
medical_history.family_history: Mother has lung cancer; no colon cancer reported.
